description:
Add balance to your hikes with a pair of reliable trekking poles. Made of durable aluminum, the Peak Powerlock Poles have an easy-to-use adjustment system that you can customize for your height or the terrain.

  • Made of 7075-T6 aircraft-grade aluminum that has a great strength to weight ratio
  • Powerlock 3.0 height adjustment holds securely and is easy to adjust
  • Durable carbide tips are long-lasting
  • EVA foam grips and padded straps add comfort for long days
  • Includes trekking baskets
name: Komperdell Peak Powerlock Trekking Pole - Unisex
